languages.text: Корабли имеют гигантскую массу и, соответственно, обладают огромной инерцией. Они не могут резко остановиться или разогнаться — на это требуется время. Как следствие этого явления, в свой ход корабль обязан пройти определенное расстояние и закончить ход может только в фазе завершения — когда большая часть хода уже совершена. Фаза завершения показана сплошной заливкой области движения.

Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-coloured area of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s movement.
languages.original_text: Корабли имеют гигантскую массу и, соответственно, обладают огромной инерцией. Они не могут резко остановиться или разогнаться — на это требуется время. Как следствие этого явления, в свой ход корабль обязан пройти определенное расстояние и закончить ход может только в фазе завершения — когда большая часть хода уже совершена. Фаза завершения показана сплошной заливкой области движения.

traits.locale_text: Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-colour area of the flagship's movement.

Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-colour area of the flagship's movement.

Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-coloured area of the flagship's movement.

Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-coloured area of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s movement.

Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-coloured area of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s movement.

languages.text: Raumschiffe haben eine gewaltige Masse und daher eine entsprechend große Trägheit. Sie können nicht abrupt beschleunigen oder anhalten – diese Prozesse benötigen Zeit Demzufolge muss jedes Schiff eine bestimmte Entfernung während seines Zugs zurücklegen und kann seinen Zug nur während der Endphase beenden, wenn der Großteil seiner Bewegung getan ist. Die Endbewegungszone ist als einfarbiger Bereich der Bewegung des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} hervorgehoben.
languages.original_text: Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-coloured area of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s movement.

traits.locale_text: Raumschiffe haben eine gewaltige Masse und daher eine entsprechend große {g|Encyclopedia:InertiaSpace}Trägheit{/g}. Sie können nicht abrupt beschleunigen oder anhalten — diese Prozesse benötigen Zeit Demzufolge muss jedes Schiff eine bestimmte Entfernung während seines {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} zurücklegen und kann seinen Zug nur während der Endphase beenden, wenn der Großteil seiner Bewegung getan ist. Die Endbewegungszone ist als einfarbiger Bereich der Bewegung des {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiffs{/g} hervorgehoben.

languages.text: Les vaisseaux spatiaux ont une masse considérable et donc une grande inertie. Ils sont incapables de s'arrêter ou d'accélérer instantanément. De telles procédures nécessitent du temps. Dès lors, chaque vaisseau doit parcourir une certaine distance pendant son tour et peut uniquement y mettre fin lors de la phase finale, lorsqu'il a couvert l'essentiel de son déplacement. La zone de fin de déplacement est mise en évidence sous forme de zone de couleur unie de déplacement du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}.
languages.original_text: Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-coloured area of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s movement.

traits.locale_text: Les vaisseaux spatiaux ont une masse considérable et donc une grande {g|Encyclopedia:InertiaSpace}inertie{/g}. Ils sont incapables de s'arrêter ou d'accélérer instantanément. De telles procédures prennent du temps. Dès lors, chaque vaisseau doit parcourir une certaine distance pendant son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et peut uniquement y mettre fin lors de la phase finale, lorsqu'il a couvert l'essentiel de son déplacement. La zone de fin de déplacement est mise en évidence sous forme de zone de couleur unie de déplacement du {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g}.

languages.text: 虚空舰质量庞大，因此也有巨大的惯性。因此，虚空舰无法立刻停止或立即加速，停止与加速的过程需要时间。 正因如此，每艘舰船每回合内必须行驶一段距离，才能结束回合。而且，只有当行驶完成，飞船处于终点区域时，才可以结束回合。终点区域在{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}移动区域之中，以纯色显示。
languages.original_text: Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-coloured area of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s movement.

traits.locale_text: 虚空舰质量庞大，因此也有巨大的{g|Encyclopedia:InertiaSpace}惯性{/g}。因此，虚空舰无法立刻停止或立即加速，停止与加速的过程需要时间。 正因如此，每艘舰船每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内必须行驶一段距离，才能结束回合。而且，只有当行驶完成，飞船处于终点区域时，才可以结束回合。终点区域在{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}移动区域之中，以纯色显示。

languages.text: La naves del vacío tienen una masa descomunal y, por tanto, también una gran cantidad de inercia. No son capaces de frenar o acelerar de inmediato, por lo que requieren tiempo para llevar a cabo estos procesos. Como consecuencia, cada nave debe recorrer cierta distancia durante su turno y solo puede darlo por finalizado en la fase final, cuando ya haya terminado la mayor parte de su movimiento. La zona de movimiento final delimita el recorrido de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} con un color uniforme.
languages.original_text: Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-coloured area of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s movement.

traits.locale_text: La naves del vacío tienen una masa descomunal y, por tanto, también una gran cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:InertiaSpace}inercia{/g}. No son capaces de frenar o acelerar de inmediato, por lo que requieren tiempo para llevar a cabo estos procesos. Como consecuencia, cada nave debe recorrer cierta distancia durante su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y solo puede darlo por finalizado en la fase final, cuando ya haya terminado la mayor parte de su movimiento. La zona de movimiento final delimita el recorrido de la {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} con un color uniforme.

languages.original_text: Ships have enormous mass and therefore have enormous inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate abruptly — it takes time. As a consequence of this phenomenon, a ship must cover a certain distance during its turn and can only finish its turn in the Completion Phase — when most of the turn has already been completed. The completion phase is shown with a solid fill in the movement area.

languages.text: ヴォイドシップは質量が膨大であるため、その慣性も大きい。停止や加速には時間を要し、瞬時に行うことはできない。 各船はターン中に特定の距離を移動しなくてはならず、移動のほとんどが終了したエンドフェーズ中にのみターンを終了することができる。移動終了ゾーンは、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の移動エリアとして単色で表示される。
languages.original_text: Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-coloured area of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s movement.

traits.locale_text: ヴォイドシップは質量が膨大であるため、その{g|Encyclopedia:InertiaSpace}慣性{/g}も大きい。停止や加速には時間を要し、瞬時に行うことはできない。 各船は{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に特定の距離を移動しなくてはならず、移動のほとんどが終了したエンドフェーズ中にのみターンを終了することができる。移動終了ゾーンは、{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}の移動エリアとして単色で表示される。

languages.text: Uçsuz gemileri devasa boyutlardadır, bu nedenle de eylemsizlikleri yüksektir. Anında duramaz veya hızlanamazlar. Bu işlemler zaman alır. Bundan dolayı, her gemi kendi turunda belirli bir mesafe katetmek zorundadır ve turunu yalnızca son evrede, hareketinin çoğunu tamamladığında sonlandırabilir. {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisinin{/g} son hareket bölgesi, dolgun renkli alanla belirtilir.
languages.original_text: Voidships have tremendous mass and therefore a large amount of inertia. They cannot stop or accelerate instantly — these processes take time. As a result, each ship must travel a certain distance on its turn and can only end its turn during the end phase, when most of its movement is done. The end movement zone is highlighted as the solid-coloured area of the {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g}'s movement.
